nodes.text: Tre Nareves was a male Mirialan, who acted as a goodwill ambassador of the Galactic Republic on Tatooine during the Cold War. As part of a goodwill initiative to gain support for the Republic, he offered a set of X-87 model perimeter sensors to the settlers at the Chuaro Farmstead in the Dreviad Wastes.
Tre Naveres is a non-player character from the massively multi-player online role playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic released by BioWare in 2011. He is voiced by Kiff VandenHeuvel.
